text: It ’ s no secret that Jonathan and Drew Scott, a. k. a. HGTV ’ s Property Brothers, have another sibling. But, apparently, not everyone knows that. Some Twitter users are trying to wrap their heads around the existence of J. D. Scott, while others posted reactions to a throwback photo unearthed by BuzzFeed writer Brad Esposito. Scott himself is also getting in on the fun as users liken his previous look to Fall Out Boy ’ s Pete Wentz, Joan Jett, and “ an Adam Lambert impersonator. ” “ There was method to that madness, ” Scott tweeted to Esposito of the photo. And as it turns out, Scott was actually a Lambert impersonator at one point in his career, he revealed in a Twitter exchange
